h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Jade Lotus Gourd Location
content: The Jade Lotus Gourd can be purchased from the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain after completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. It costs 7,200 Will to buy it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jade_Lotus_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Jade Lotus Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Jade Lotus Gourd Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Jade Lotus Gourd can be purchased from the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain after completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. It costs 7,200 Will to buy it.
